I could only replicate the problem when running the entire suite of UI tests.  
The first problem was that when importing the second time as part of that test, 
the import was trying to happen from the workspace, not from the zip.  So I 
changed the code to import from the zip (as it should).  The second odd thing I 
noticed was some extra project in the workspace called 
testWorkSetAdaptationProject0.  After making the change for the first problem 
and running the entire suite of UI tests, i no longer saw the failure.  I will 
attach a patch.

Created an attachment (id=29881)
apply to ImportExistingTest.java

Doug, can you run the UI tests using this patch?  I also changed some of the
failure messages.
